Uses of Package
org.strongback.control

  • Packages that use org.strongback.control 
    Package Description
    org.strongback.command  
    org.strongback.control  
    org.strongback.hardware  
  • Classes in org.strongback.control used by org.strongback.command 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    A simple controller that can manage a component (typically a motor) based upon a desired target value and tolerance.
  • Classes in org.strongback.control used by org.strongback.control 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    A simple controller that can manage a component (typically a motor) based upon a desired target value and tolerance.
    PIDController
    A Controller extension for Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controllers with optional support for feed forward.
    PIDController.Gains
    A set of gains.
    SoftwarePIDController
    A software-only Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller with optional support for feed forward.
    SoftwarePIDController.SourceType 
    SoftwarePIDController.Target 
    TalonController
    A hardware-based Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller that runs on the Talon SRX motor controller.
    TalonController.ControlMode
    The type of control input used by this Talon controller.
    TalonController.Gains
    A set of gains.
  • Classes in org.strongback.control used by org.strongback.hardware 
    Class and Description
    TalonController
    A hardware-based Proportional Integral Differential (PID) controller that runs on the Talon SRX motor controller.
